description:
Ashito Aoi is a young, aspiring soccer player from a backwater town in Japan. His hopes of getting into a high school with a good soccer club are dashed when he causes an incident during a critical match for his team, which results in their loss and elimination from the tournament. Nevertheless, he catches the eye of someone important who happened to be visiting from Tokyo. How will things turn out for Ashito?

(Source: Shogakukan Asia)
synonyms: AOASHI แข็งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

tags.name: Football
tags.description: Centers around the sport of football (known in the USA as "soccer").

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

node.description:
__[Blog](http://ameblo.jp/yugo-kobayashi0503/)__

__Yuugo Kobayashi__ is a Japanese mangaka, who is best known for the work [Ao Ashi](https://anilist.co/manga/107279/Ao-Ashi/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/saifu1low)

Masahiro Yokotani does series composition and scriptwriting.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/uirozamurai) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/uirozamurai)

Manabu Nakatake is a character designer, animator, animation director and prop designer affiliated with [Yostar Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6371/Yostar-Pictures). He was previously affiliated with [Tatsunoko Production](https://anilist.co/studio/103/Tatsunoko-Production).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/waka_fuumi)

A regular presence in the [Precure](https://anilist.co/anime/603/) franchise since its beginning.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/uirozamurai) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/uirozamurai)

Manabu Nakatake is a character designer, animator, animation director and prop designer affiliated with [Yostar Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6371/Yostar-Pictures). He was previously affiliated with [Tatsunoko Production](https://anilist.co/studio/103/Tatsunoko-Production).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_bamboo)

He grew up in Mexico because of his parents' work. In elementary school he read Ishinomori Shoutarou's Cyborg 009. Later he experienced the Yamato and Gundam boom, prompting him to be interested in animation. He started working as background artist, later becoming freelance. During that time Takeda got acquainted with Tokuhiro Hiragi and Tatsuya Kushida, whom he then helped establishing the art studio Bihou in 1993.

In 2005 he established the independent art studio Bamboo, which became a company in 2007.

(Source: AniDB)
__Maiko Imazeki__ is a Japanese director of photography and photographer.
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.
